section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossProperty element is specialized from data. It is defined in the glossary entry module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the glossProperty element can be used to provide information about the gender of a term:
example.codeblock: <glossentry id="algorithm" xml:lang="es-es"> <glossterm>El algoritmo</glossterm> <glossdef>Un algoritmo define un mÃ©todo de calcular un resultado.</glossdef> <glossBody> <glossPartOfSpeech value="noun"/> <glossProperty name="gender" value="masculine"/> </glossBody> </glossentry>
